KA.IUHCI.content: supreme task nature has set for mankind: freedom under external laws (Freiheit unter äußeren Gesetzen), a perfectly just civil constitution (eine vollkommen gerechte bürgerliche Verfassung) > the greatest want (Not) leads to laws [metaphor of trees]

source.title: Idea for a Universal History with Cosmopolitan Intent
source.author: KA
